name: Roper
description: A stone-like creature resembling stalagmites or stalactites, with long rope-like tendrils used for grappling.
memorable: Its ability to blend into cave formations and its powerful tendril attacks make it a formidable ambush predator.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting prey in dark caves and tunnels.
relations: Often found in dark caves, could share territory with other subterranean creatures.
strengths: High armor class and hit points, powerful grappling abilities with long reach.
weaknesses: Low mobility with a speed of only 10 ft., and vulnerabilities in its tendrils.
attacks: Multiattack with up to four tendril strikes and a bite, grappling and restraining opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Grasping Tendrils can restrain multiple targets, giving the Roper strong control over the battlefield.
senses: Has blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to detect prey even in darkness.
skills: Good at stealth, capable of hiding while motionless in its environment.
additional_information: Can extrude replacement tendrils if damaged.
Immunity to poison and psychic damage for tendrils.
Can climb difficult surfaces, including ceilings, without needing checks.
False Appearance makes it difficult to detect while stationary.
Resistant to exhaustion and the frightened condition.
test_queries: monster that blends into cave walls
dangerous creature with long gripping tendrils
large stone-like creature with multiple attacks
creature that grapples and pulls prey
